author: Special Correspondent
text:
A spotted deer died after it was accidentally caught in an iron fence in a private farm near Paithur village near Attur abutting reserve forests on Thursday.

For water

The spotted deer, aged about two years, was said to have strayed into the human habitation in search of drinking water.

On spotting the carcass of the animal, the local people informed the forest personnel.

A team of forest men led by Sirajuddin, forest ranger, rushed to the spot and retrieved the carcass.

Buried

Veterinary surgeons conducted post-mortem on the spot, following which it was taken to the forest office and buried.

The forest personnel suspect that the deer could have been caught in the iron fence while trying to escape from the chasing stray dogs.
title: Spotted deer dies
